subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Interlagos track has one of the longest straights, leading into a sweeping, downhill corner where the drivers have the main chance to overtake. But that corner also provides one of the biggest challenges.
snippet: The Interlagos track has one of the longest straights, leading into a sweeping, downhill corner where the drivers have the main chance to overtake. But that corner also provides one of the biggest challenges.
